thread.title: Energy Department will pay you $5,000 to design a new logo for plug-in cars
thread.title_full: Energy Department will pay you $5,000 to design a new logo for plug-in cars

title: Energy Department will pay you $5,000 to design a new logo for plug-in cars
text:
31 Energy Department will pay you $5,000 to design a new logo for plug-in cars 
The Washington Post: The Department of Energy is giving away $5,000 in cash to a creative individual who can design a logo for its plug-in electric vehicles (PEVs) program.
